## DatabaseResponse class

When doing DML on a database table using OpenRestDB the response from the database is parsed into a DatabaseResponse

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DatabaseResponse 
```

|  [failed](./forms42core.databaseresponse.failed.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Whether the statement failed |
